entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
